title: Hog farms add bacteria and nutrients to lakes

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to increase both the nutrient levels and the bacterial content of lake water?

choices.label: Runoff from a nearby hog farm
Thermal pollution from a nearby power plant
Increased aeration of the lake water
Percolation of the water through soil to groundwater
Acidification of the lake water by acid deposition

content.answer: Runoff from a nearby hog farm
